page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The block is made up of rural, residential and industrial areas.A lot of it shows the outskirts of Kirkby to the north.It is outside of the main town centre and, therefore, it is lacking in amenities. Never the less, the town centre is only short walking distance for most people and those who live further away are generally served by good bus services. In the rural areas the land tends to be mainly cultivated and shared by some seventeen farms. There is very little cattle or sheep farming. Most of the housing is modern since Kirkby is very much a modern town, though there are some lovely old cottages that show what Kirkby must have been like before the 1950's.
